titlestmt.titleproper: Daniel Buck order book for William H. Hazel and Daniel Buck, wigmakers 1874-1878
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Daniel Buck order book for William H. Hazel and Daniel Buck, wigmakers
did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: Daniel Buck was a wigmaker in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. A good portion of his work was done for the theater.

scopecontent.p: This volume is Buck's order book for wigs. Each entry in the volume includes head measurements and design specifications for the wigs. Many entries include sketches of the customer's head or the wig itself, as well as prices. Customers who purchased wigs from Buck include Edwin Booth, James Hardie, the Walnut Street Theatre, and the Chestnut Street Theatre.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of the Moyerman family.
